name: endeavor: anno 3310
description:
Inspired by Endeavor by zillix

Submitted to 5 game jams:
Nokia Jam - styled to look like a game for the Nokia 3310
Metroidvania Month - it's a metroidvania. There's upgrades such as the jump fruit, endurance fruits, cape etc. that unlock further areas of the game
Untitled Game Jam - this is a demake of the Flash game Endeavor by zillix
4th Wall Broken - it's subtle, but it's there. Try to find the 4th wall breaks ¡)
Platformer Challenge - there are climbable platforms and vines all throughout the world

Assets used:
5x5 font by maneirinho (https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/2133370)
Nokia sound pack by Trix (https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources)
Nokia soundfont by Krasno (https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources)
